snippet: The comedian has reached an agreement with Henry Holt & Company to publish a memoir covering over four decades of his life and featuring his thoughts on growing older, The Associated Press reported.
abstract: Henry Holt & Company is to publish a memoir from comedian Billy Cristal, covering over four decades of his life and featuring his thoughts on growing older.
lead_paragraph: The comedian has reached an agreement with Henry Holt & Company to publish a memoir covering over four decades of his life and featuring his thoughts on growing older, The Associated Press reported.

headline.main: A Memoir to Come From Billy Crystal
headline.print_headline: A Memoir to Come From Billy Crystal
